mapper.insert: INSERT INTO game_rent (rent_num, rent_sdate, rent_edate, rent_period, mem_num, item_num, rent_status) VALUES (game_rent_seq.nextval, #{rent_sdate}, #{rent_edate}, #{rent_period}, #{mem_num}, #{item_num}, #{rent_status})
mapper.select: SELECT gr.*, i.item_name FROM game_rent gr LEFT JOIN item i ON gr.item_num = i.item_num WHERE gr.mem_num = #{mem_num}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM game_rent gr JOIN member m ON gr.mem_num = m.mem_num JOIN item i ON gr.item_num = i.item_num WHERE gr.mem_num = #{mem_num}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM game_rent gr JOIN member m ON gr.mem_num = m.mem_num JOIN item i ON gr.item_num = i.item_num

SELECT gr.*, i.item_name, m.mem_email, d.mem_nickname FROM game_rent gr LEFT JOIN item i ON gr.item_num = i.item_num LEFT JOIN member m ON gr.mem_num = m.mem_num LEFT JOIN member_detail d ON m.mem_num = d.mem_num
